feed.title: AT&T/ISPs making Bitcoin Core near impossible to use as a full node via hidden private dynamic IPs, not by specifically blocking 8333 or Bitcoin as stated in original email

entry.title: AT&T/ISPs making Bitcoin Core near impossible to use as a full node via hidden private dynamic IPs, not by specifically blocking 8333 or Bitcoin as stated in original email
entry.summary: The email thread starts with Zach G stating that AT&T does not allow a public static IP without payment. It is unclear what part of bitcoin development he is addressing.
